author: jahtias2017
title: Excellent hotel stay I will definitely be coming back sometimes I like to get a break from work or home so I stayed love
text: I will definitely come back my experience being there was wonderful love love love love love love the bed it was so comfortable. All the staff was very nice and always help me when I needed help the water was nice and hot.
